text:
To Jab or Not to Jab? Charlie Mullins OBE joins @cliveholland today, to discuss COVID-19 procedures for @PimlicoPlumbers and the introduction of their 'No Jab No Job' policy for new starters.

Listen from 1pm here: https://t.co/zwikaZR9aM

#covid19 #pandemic #plumbing #vaccine https://t.co/e6ceY4HYEf
